snippet: DEL TUFO--Robert, one of New Jersey's most revered and accomplished public servants, died at home in Princeton on March 2nd. He was 82. A graduate of Princeton University ('55) and Yale Law School ('58), he served as United States Attorney, Attorney General and in scores of pro-bono positions. He concluded his career at Skadden Arps. He is survived by his wife, Katherine Nouri Hughes, four children, two stepchildren and ten grandchildren. A memorial service will be held on March 16th at 3pm at Richardson Auditorium at Princeton University. In lieu of flowers, please make contributions to the Orpheus Chamber Orchestra in New York City. 1/3
lead_paragraph: DEL TUFO--Robert, one of New Jersey's most revered and accomplished public servants, died at home in Princeton on March 2nd. He was 82. A graduate of Princeton University ('55) and Yale Law School ('58), he served as United States Attorney, Attorney General and in scores of pro-bono positions. He concluded his career at Skadden Arps. He is survived by his wife, Katherine Nouri Hughes, four children, two stepchildren and ten grandchildren. A memorial service will be held on March 16th at 3pm at Richardson Auditorium at Princeton University. In lieu of flowers, please make contributions to the Orpheus Chamber Orchestra in New York City. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  DEL TUFO, ROBERT
